## Task 4

```{r}
angles = seq(0, 2*pi, by=0.001)
x4 = 20 * abs(sin(angles)) * round(cos(angles), digits=6)
y4 = 20 * abs(sin(angles)) * round(sin(angles), digits=6)

plot(1, xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0,100), type="n")
polygon(x4 + 50, y4 + 60)
```
